column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I had the jinya bun. It was okay. Maybe I feel this way because I've had ippudo's pork bun... Oh baby. Oh baby oh baby oh baby. Anyway
column2: this jinya bun was interesting. It had mayo? Maybe too much on mine. Meat was cooked nice but I think they drizzle hoisin sauce? Too sweet.
